dcterms:creator: G. Inches
F. Crestani
dcterms:description: The PAN 2012 competition dataset was created to serve as a reference point for evaluating various approaches to identify online sexual predators. It contains hundreds of thousands of conversations, including predatory chats and general chats, collected from various sources.
dcterms:title: PAN 2012 dataset

dcterms:creator: M. P. Akhter
Z. Jiangbin
I. R. Naqvi
M. AbdelMajeed
T. Zia
dcterms:description: The Roman Urdu dataset contains 147,180 comments from multiple YouTube videos, labeled as abusive or non-abusive. It is used for detecting abusive language in Roman Urdu.
dcterms:title: Roman Urdu dataset

dcterms:creator: M. P. Akhter
Z. Jiangbin
I. R. Naqvi
M. Abdelmajeed
M. T. Sadiq
dcterms:description: The Urdu dataset consists of 2,170 comments collected from YouTube, annotated as abusive or non-abusive. It is used for detecting abusive language in Urdu.
dcterms:title: Urdu dataset
